item.description:
The Captain ROCKS Saturday night at

the Nw Deal Steak Place in Westbrook! ﻿﻿﻿

 

New Deal was opened in July 1996 and has had an increasing business every year. It is one of the most popular steak houses on the shoreline. Offering Great Happy Hour Specials Monday - Friday in FDR's Tap Room, as well as some weekend specials. There are several dining areas at New Deal including banquet facilities for that special event. HEre's a link to their website to check out their menu, get mroe info, etc. http://www.culinarymenus.com/newdealsteakplace.htm.

For anyone who is new to Party Express - or just haven't been paying attention - I (Tom “The Captain” Ferrara) am a PartyExpress! member. I play a classic selection of acoustic rock that includes everyone from James Taylor and The Beatles to Green Day and Collective Soul. 

 I've performed a number of happy hours, open mic nights and private partied from the living room to the patio to the beach. I've also played wine-tasting benefits for The Estuary Council in Old Saybrook and Literacy Volunteers Valley Shore CT and headlined Sunday afternoon at this year's Old Saybrook Arts and Crafts Festival. 

And now..., for the first time, I will be at

 New Deal Steak Place

 on Saturday evening, November 12th starting at 7:30 PM. 

I will be playing from 7:30 to 10:30 PM. Come early for dinner or stop by for a drink. Either way, I think this will be a fun evening. As always, the meetups for my performances are very casual, loosely origanized and are as much for your information as anything else. I'm always happy to see you whenever you can make it! 

 Please note that if you plan to go for dinner that reservations ar e only accepted for parties of EIGHT (8) or more. 

 

P.S. – I can't say too often  how much I appreciate the continued support and encouragement that I receive from the members of PartyExpres and other MeetUp groups. Thank you.    -Tom
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the bar area

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Captain Rocks a whole New Deal
